name: Operation Smile
shortDescription: Volunteer-led charity supporting cleft surgeries and awareness.
description: Operation Smile is a student-led volunteering and charity club focused on raising awareness and funds for children around the world who need cleft lip and palate surgeries. Members organize campaigns, coordinate donation drives, and partner with local organizations to make an impact.

name: Baking Club
shortDescription: Learn baking basics, share recipes, and sell treats for causes.
description: Baking Club brings together students who love to create delicious treats. From cookies to cakes, we explore techniques, share recipes, and host bake sales to support school events and charities. Beginners welcome!

name: Football Team
shortDescription: Train hard, compete proudly—join the school football squad.
description: The Football Team is open to all students interested in competitive play and fitness. We train year-round with a focus on teamwork, discipline, and sportsmanship. Tryouts happen each semester; fitness sessions are open to all members.

name: Art Club
shortDescription: Explore painting, illustration, crafts, and collaborative projects.
description: Art Club is a welcoming space for creators of all levels. We explore painting, drawing, and mixed media while working on collaborative murals and exhibitions for the school. Supplies are provided; bring your creativity!

name: Music Band
shortDescription: Perform contemporary and classical pieces at school events.
description: Music Band is for instrumentalists and vocalists who want to perform as an ensemble. We rehearse weekly, develop setlists across genres, and play at school assemblies and local showcases.
